response.job_title: Excellence Leader | Lean Six Sigma Black Belt | MSc. Productivity & Quality Eng.
response.summary: Certified LSS Black Belt and Lean Expert, with leadership skills and  a change enthusiast. Proven knowledge of lean principles and philosohpy. (5S, Kaizen, TPM, JIT, OPF, 7W, Heijunka, Hoshin Kanri). Savings projects development trough material cost reduction, value add increase, automation and digitalization (Industry 4.0)
response.skills: Herramientas de automatización de pruebas, Mapa del flujo de valor, Microsoft Power Automate, Ahorro de costes, Process Transformation, Liderazgo, Lean Six Sigma, Digitalization, Programming, Gestión de proyectos, Análisis, Gestión de cambios, Metodologías ágiles, Gestión de resultados, AutoCAD, Minitab, SharePoint, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, Lucidchart

profile_positions.description:
Leader of the Business Excellence Center within the Global Shared Services unit (Financial and IT | 900 collaborators). Planning, deployment, maintenance, and direction of the business excellence system for delivering results and transforming the culture through subsystems and processes including:

-Strategy: Hoshin Kanri, KPIs, and strategic projects.
-Talent Development: White Belt, Yellow Belt, Green Belt certification. Excellence Masterclasses and basic, intermediate, and advanced MS Excel training.
-Teamwork: Gamification and recognition.
-Lean: PDCA methodology (Quick Wins, Kaizen) and tools like RCA, VSM, BPMN, Makigami, Poka Yokes, Pareto, and SIPOC.
-Six Sigma: DMAIC methodology, tools such as FMEA, SPC, descriptive and inferential statistics.
-Citizen Development: Automation (RPA, VBA, Power Automate, SAP Scripts) and Analytics (MS Excel Dashboards, Qlik Sense).

Annual generation of financial benefits of USD 1.2M, annual efficiencies of 15 FTEs, and 40% ROI. Management and leadership of a global team of 7 members.
profile_positions.title: Global Business Excellence Lead

profile_positions.description:
Process and Service Excellence Representative of Ball Corporation's GBS (Global Business Services), North and Central America region. Lean Six Sigma Trainer, DMAIC Coach, skilled in VSM, BPM, RCA, FMEA tools, and Hoshin Kanri.

Leader and team member of administrative improvement and digital transformation projects: "Paperless" initiatives, information analysis dashboards (Qlik Sense), routine automation (RPA, Visual Basic, JavaScript). 

Documentation, optimization, metric creation, and KPI implementation. Advocate for engaging and motivating the workforce towards continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Process Excellence Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing and promoting increased productivity at the medium and low-voltage electrical panel production factory with 800 employees and five assembly lines. Management and tracking of quantifiable savings and efficiency measures (VAM - Value Added Measure) for USD 1.2M, coordination of the "3i Ideas" improvement program to engage and involve employees in continuous improvement activities, using gamification, recognition, coaching, and financial compensation.

Coordinating and implementing the 6S program for the factory, participating in cost reduction projects through CVE (Cost Value Engineering) and digitization efforts (Paperless / MES / Mobile Apps). In charge of Lean / SPS (Siemens Production System) training for 2000 employees, focusing on 6S, Kaizen events, VSM, and the 7 wastes.

Member of the joint task force with the parent company to improve productivity in the assembly line of medium-voltage cells SDV7.
profile_positions.title: Productivity Engineer

profile_positions.location: Santa Rosa de Jauregui, Querétaro Arteaga, México
profile_positions.description:
Design of the continuous improvement system for the factory (Based on Lean Six Sigma).

Design of the digitization strategy for continuous production processes and administrative processes (Microsoft Navision).

Design of the new product development process for agile market launches.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing and promoting continuous improvement at the low and medium-voltage panel factory with 200 employees through the implementation of VAM measures (Labor efficiencies), MCP (Material cost reduction), and PPC (Purchase cost reduction). Achieved annual savings of USD 200k. Supervised a team of 7 members.

Developed Industry 4.0 projects: Implemented MES modules through citizen development in Visual Basic within the factory. Micro-automation of the OEE indicator and FAT test recording with PLCs and PC-based systems.

Improved production, administrative, assembly, and maintenance processes. Applied Lean Manufacturing principles and tools: 5S, Pokayokes, Kanban, Kaizen, VSM.

Managed the SPS (Siemens Production System) in the factory and oversaw the end-to-end business process for the sale, engineering, and production of S8 and 8BT panels, including administrative areas of the factory and the business unit (Logistics, procurement, projects, sales).
profile_positions.title: Continuous Improvement Coordinator

education.degree_name: MSc. Quality and Productivity Systems Engineering

company.name: Ball Corporation
company.description: Ball Corporation supplies innovative and sustainable packaging solutions for beverage, personal care and household products customers, as well as aerospace and other technologies and services primarily for the U.S. government. Ball Corporation and its subsidiaries employ more than 21,500 people worldwide and reported 2020 net sales of $11.8 billion. For more information, visit www.ball.com, or connect with us on Facebook or Twitter
